confirm.description: Do you want to add the Xiaomi Car Air Purifier `{name}` to Home Assistant?

user.description:
Select your Xiaomi Car Air Purifier from the dropdown list, or manually enter the Bluetooth MAC address if your device is not listed.

Example MAC address format: AA:BB:CC:DD:EE:FF

manual.title: Add Device Manually
manual.description:
No devices found automatically. You can manually enter the Bluetooth MAC address of your Xiaomi Car Air Purifier.

To find the MAC address:
1. Check Settings → Devices & Services → Bluetooth in Home Assistant
2. Or use a Bluetooth scanner app on your phone
3. Look for a device named like 'MI-CAR' or similar

Example format: AA:BB:CC:DD:EE:FF

error.invalid_mac: Invalid MAC address format. Please use format like AA:BB:CC:DD:EE:FF

abort.no_devices_found:
No Xiaomi Car Air Purifier found.

Please ensure:
• The device is powered on
• Bluetooth is enabled in Home Assistant
• The device is within range
• The device is not connected to another device

Tip: The device will be automatically discovered when available. You can also check Settings → Devices & Services → Bluetooth to see discovered devices.
abort.no_bluetooth: Bluetooth is not enabled in Home Assistant
